meanings.definition: Arranged in a definite pattern or organization.
meanings.sent1: The structured schedule helped me stay organized.
meanings.sent2: The structured essay had a clear introduction, body, and conclusion.
meanings.sent3: The structured puzzle made it easy to put together.
meanings.sent4: Her structured approach to problem-solving was like following a map.
meanings.sent5: The structured rows of trees in the orchard created a beautiful pattern.

meanings.definition: Having a well-defined shape or form.
meanings.sent1: The structured building stood tall against the skyline.
meanings.sent2: The structured cake had perfectly even layers.
meanings.sent3: The structured clouds in the sky looked like fluffy pillows.
meanings.sent4: Her structured hairdo was like a work of art.
meanings.sent5: The structured sandcastle on the beach was a masterpiece of design.
